Text:
Thanks so much, dude!  Usually you only see international-interest sports (soccer, MMA, etc.) get represented on the Torrent networks, so it's good to see some Americans get involved, too.

Baseball Prospectus is always a great book, but I couldn't afford it this year.  So you saved me trips to the bookstore, sitting there reading it, but not being able to buy it.  

Thanks again to you and all the Seeders!
